title: Check the status of an MMM data request

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: mmm_request_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the MMM data request. To create an MMM data request and obtain the data request ID, use /mmm/api/create/ . To retrieve historical MMM data requests, including data request IDs, use /mmm/api/history/ .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Status of the data request. Enum values: request received : The request was received but data processing has not started. in progress : Data processing is in progress. completed - ready for download : Data processing has completed and the data is ready for download. To obtain a download URL for the data, use /mmm/api/download/ . failed : The request failed.

fields.name: message
fields.description: Returned only when status is failed . The reason why the data request failed.
